item.title: IGN's Nintendo Direct Coverage
item.description: A Strong Nintendo Direct Also Showed Why the End Is in Sight for the Switch

item.title: A Nintendo Direct Joke Went Too Far At CSUF
item.description: Professor urged to cancel class for "the good of humanity"

item.title: Nintendo Cuts down Sales Forecast After Dissapointing Holiday Season
item.description: Nintendo said it now expects to sell 18 million Switch units for the fiscal year ending March 2023, down from a previous forecast of 19 million.

item.title: Max From A Goofy Movie Is An Insanely Hot Lumbersexual
item.description: We obviously all remember the main star from A Goofy Movie right?

item.title: Japan's Nintendo Direct Had A Very Nice Surprise
item.description: Not every game announced in one region features in the promotions for another
